name: Archery Land
description:
Protect the Shrine from the Monsters

You became a warrior who was called by the goddess to protect the shrine of water.
As evening approaches, monsters aiming for the Shrine of Water appear.





Pass the Ordeals

Warrior!
Pass 6 ordeals to protect the shrine of water from monsters.
And become a legendary warrior who protects the shrine of water and protects the goddess by killing monsters!
Also, Be the greatest warrior in a breathtaking 1v1 battle with other warriors in the arena of Archery Land.





Protect the Shrine

Once you enter the game, there is a tutorial, which makes it more intuitive to start playing.
It's explained in writing on the wall, so it's easy to start.
With additional voice guidance, you can enter the game more smoothly.

#VRShooting #Shocked #NO motion sickness

Draw a parabola with real VR archery
Try flying the arrow beautifully.

When you hit the target! With explosive sounds and brilliant effects,
Not only does it give you a more realistic feeling of hitting,

There's no movement
You can play more pleasantly without getting motion sickness.




Features:
🎯 Battle! Become the best warrior!
🎯 Aim! Use your bow to hit a moving target!
🎯 Fire! Shoot the arrow faster than anyone else!
🎯 Please! What's the limit of my power? Throw the arrow as far as you can!
🏹 Brain at full capacity! Use all your senses to memorize!
🏹 Clear all single games to lift the boss's game!
🏹 If I catch the boss, maybe I'll get something good...?
🏆 Collect! Improve your skills and collect all your medals!
